contest-event.event-date: April 9, 1961 D Durham League Contest (Section A) Durham League Contest (Section A) 10 Test Piece Contest Durham League Contest durham-league-contest-section-a The 2010 contest, due to take place on 5th December, was cancelled due to heavy snow. (4barsrest news article) Tintagel Welfare Hall, Easington, County Durham Prizes - 1st £18 and trophy, 2nd £10 and cup, 3rd £5. 7 bands competed. Nov. 23, 2014, 12:14 p.m. Jan. 18, 2017, 7:27 p.m. 1 Crookhall Colliery J. J. Stobbs 2 Easington Colliery Band Cecil Peacock Jnr 3 BHK (UK) Horden Band A. L.
